```{r glossary flextable}
data.frame(Abbreviation = c("EG", "IE"), 
           Definition = c("Exempli gratia", "Id Est")) %>% 
  arrange(Abbreviation, Definition) %>% 
  flextable() %>% 
  align(part = "all", j = 2, align = "left") %>% 
  bold(part = "header") %>% 
  width(width = c(3.5, 13.01), unit = "cm")
```
